{{disambig}}

'''Enchanted''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* [[Enchanting]], which can make items enchanted.
* {{ItemLink|Enchanted Book}}, used on an anvil with an item to enchant it.
* {{ItemLink|Enchanted Golden Apple}}, a variant of golden apple.
* [[Featured servers#List of featured servers|Enchanted]], a featured server.

=== April Fools' jokes ===
* {{ItemLink|Enchanted Golden Poisonous Potato}}, a variant of golden poisonous potato which also grants Luck and Bad Luck.

== ''Minecraft: Story Mode'' ==
* {{SMItemLink|Enchanted Flint and Steel}}, a flint and steel able of lighting tall fire and activating portals.
* {{SMItemLink|Iron Sword}}, which can be enchanted.
* {{SMItemLink|Diamond Sword}}, which can be enchanted.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
* {{MCD|Enchantment}}s, a mechanic used to enhance armor and weapons and/or add properties to them.
* {{MCD|Enchanted mobs}}, a type of mobs which come with enchantments applied.
* {{DuItemLink|Enchanted Grass}}, the artifact used to summon enchanted sheep.
* {{DuEntityLink|Enchanted Sheep}}, a summonable pet with three random variants.
